column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Second time here and love it. The spicy chicken ramen the first time made me want to come back and get the Tokyo Yatai ramen. it was fantastic
column2: the pork was so tender and juicy. All the flavors worked perfect with each other. I should have got the spicy version because for me it did need a little bit more of a kick
column3: but a small dab of spicy sauce that is on the table and boom
